Clutch of Winter.name: Clutch of Winter
Clutch of Winter.flavor: You swing your frosty weapon in a deadly arc, freezing your foe in place.
Clutch of Winter.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier cold damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

World's End Rage.name: World's End Rage
World's End Rage.flavor: Your strike encases your foe in ice. Snow then swirls around you and freezes your enemies as you rage across the battlefield.
World's End Rage.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier cold damage, and the target is restrained (save ends).
World's End Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the world’s end. Until the rage ends, when you hit any enemy with an at-will attack power, that enemy is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Armor of Glaciers.name: Armor of Glaciers
Armor of Glaciers.flavor: A layer of primal frost covers you, deflecting your foes’ attacks until it is chipped away.
Armor of Glaciers.effect: You gain resist 20 to all damage until the end of the encounter. Whenever this resistance reduces damage, the resistance decreases by 5, and it ends when it reaches 0. If you take fire damage, the resistance ends after reducing that damage.
